prompts: Create a playful fire-type Pokemon with a fluffy tail and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small monkey-like creature that can control flames and loves to dance.
Show me a vibrant orange Pokemon that uses fire-based attacks in battles.
Design a charming bipedal Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and enjoys warm climates.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a bright personality, who makes friends easily in urban settings.
Make a fire-type Pokemon that has an energetic vibe and a passion for cooking.
Give me a cute monkey Pokemon that loves to play with fire and has a big smile.

distinctive_features: Fluffy tuft of hair on head
Long tail with a flame-like tip
